text: Barisal Sadar () is an Upazila of Barisal District in the Division of Barisal, Bangladesh. ==Population== The population of Barisal Sadar Upazila is 527,017. Males are 52.72% of the population, and females 47.28%. The population density is about 1625 people per kmÂ². ==References== Category:Subdivisions of Bangladesh Category:Barisal Division
title: Barisal Sadar Upazila
